name: Magg-O-Net Monster
description: Being made of maggots, the Magg-O-Net Monster is apricot colored and has a glowing red magnet on its chest with a circle above the magnet. The Magg-O-Net Monster has four big arms from the side of its chest, and two smaller arms coming from the front of its chest. The inside of its mouth is red, and it has brown eyes and light-brown eyeballs.

attributes.Ability: Enhanced Eating Body Regeneration Enhanced Strength

name: Medic
description: He wears a light blue outfit with black accents and a black eye patch. His skin is pale pink and has pink eyes. He has a purple scar on his right eye. He has four small and sharp teeth and four grey claws on each of his hands. He has six arms on his upper body and two on his lower body. His lower body is similar to his upper one but he has eye patches on both of his eyes and a scar on the opposite side.

name: Yeti
description: Yetis are large humanoids with lilac skin. Their bodies are covered in dark gray hair with the exception of their stomachs, hands, feet, ears and around their eyes. They have yellow eyes with red pupils, and a magenta nose.

name: Voratia Rumbletum
description: Voratia has similar coloration to a Perk, but has lighter-green spots on her darker parts. She wears purple lipstick and has a mole under the left corner of her mouth. Her yellow eyes are usually squinting. She has one large bulb in the center of the back of her head between the two rows of bulbs, resembling a hair bun. She is twice as tall as a Murk or Perk Gourmand, and is noticeably fatter. She has a pair of spectacles that she holds up to her eyes while addressing her subjects.

name: Piscciss Core Guards
description: InDeep, the Piscciss Core Guards preventedthe teamfrom enteringPiscciss' core, but relented afterPykepromised to keep an eye on them. WhenUltimate Aggregorstole theCentripetal Accelerator, Pyke set off an alarm to alert the guards, assumingBenhad something to do with it. Ben chased after Ultimate Aggregor asBig Chillbut was confronted by theCommanderand another guard. He evolved intoUltimate Big Chillto deal with them but could not keep up with Aggregor as a result.

name: Probity
description: Probity is a nice little girl who tried to fulfill one goal: restoring the former peace on her planet at all costs, which forced her to ask for help from Ben Tennyson, whom she considered to be the greatest hero in the universe. The team, however, failed to resolve the conflict, on the contrary, they formed a new one in which both factions joined together. Thus, Probity hated Ben.

name: Handy Buddy
description: Handy Buddy's overall appearance is similar to Four Arms, except it lacks theOmnitrixsymbol on his shoulder, and his features are more cartoonish. His face is more oval-shaped and his eyes are larger than Four Arms's, with his upper eyes poking out of his head, and his teeth are pink. Handy Buddy's muscles aren't detailed, and each elbow has two short spikes. His feet are also rectangular in shape, with two pointy toes.

He also wears brown boots, hand wraps, and head wraps that leave his face and ears exposed. name: OK Ben Let's Go Universe
description: The group was formed afterGarnet,Ben(asFour Arms) andK.O.saveRaven. Eventually, they are cornered, and asStrikeprepares to deliver his final blow, K.O. steals hispen. He gives the heroes their powers back, and they all fight Strike. K.O. throws Ben at Strike using his powerful fist, and Ben defeats Strike once and for all. Raven's uses her powers to make everyone a portal home.

attributes.Creator: K.O.
attributes.Objective: Stop Strike and restore the CN City (complete

name: Providence
description: Providenceis a global, clandestine military organization that was created in response to the Nanite Event. Providence's initial function was to contain or kill hostileEVOs. Over time, the organization discovered a teenager named Rex Salazar, ahuman-passing EVO capable of curing other EVOs. Providence then decided to take a more ethical approach to make curing EVOs priority.
